name: Central Flying Academy (Pty) Ltd
about: Central Flying Academy (Pty) Ltd is one of the largest and most reputable flying schools in Southern Africa. We offer a comprehensive range of pilot training courses, including Private (PPL), Commercial (CPL), and Airline Transport (ATPL) Pilot Licenses. Our academy is dedicated to providing high-quality, professional training to aspiring pilots, whether they are pursuing a career in aviation or flying as a hobby. We regularly organize fly-ins, breakfast trips, and weekend getaways to enhance the learning experience. With a strong commitment to safety and excellence, Central Flying Academy is the ideal choice for those seeking world-class flight training. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities ensure that our students receive the best possible education to succeed in their aviation careers.
